instructions: place the dinner plate towards the bottom of the mat
place the dinner fork on the left side of the dinner plate, with the tines pointing upwards
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the tines pointed upwards
place the dinner knife on the right side of the dinner plate with the blade pointed upwards
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade pointed upwards
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl pointed upwards
place the water glass above the dinner plate on the right side, above the dinner knife
place the wine glass to the right of the water glass, above the soup spoon
place the wine glass to the right of the other wine glass
place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon, below the second wine glass
place the bread plate to the left of the dinner plate above the dinner fork
place the butter knife on the bread plate with the blade pointed away from the dinner plate
place the dessert fork above the dinner plate with the tines pointed towards the water glass
place the desert spoon above the dessert fork with the bowl pointed towards the bread plate
place the napkin on top of the dinner plate with the decoration pointed towards the dessert spoon
